title: The Hidden Reality
description: With The New Reality now in control of the worldâ€™s nations, the brilliant doctor and inventor Alex Pella finds himself caught in a deadly power struggle between the tyrant who rules and the one who would. As he sets out on a mission to unravel the New World Order, he must also face the hidden truths about his own genetic heritage, truths that are slowly destroying him. When he receives an ambiguous message sent from a man long since dead, Alex learns that the only way to win his battle against The New Reality is to defeat a long-forgotten enemy nearly 2,500 years old.This action-packed novel brilliantly weaves together ancient Greece with a disturbing future, carrying with it a warning for us all.
author: Stephen Martino
